title: What is your opinion about Emiway Bantai's new song Dhua Dhua? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to me the song Dhua Dhua of Amiway Bantai is recently released song on 25 December. But it is difficult to say how much it popular becomes. But as per the lyrics of the song we can say it will makes becomes one of the best popular song of Amiway Bantai Lyrics given below Lyrics / vocals / mix and master by — Amiway Bantai Music by — CALL ME G Directed by — ALAM DOP — JOE HOWARD EDIT — Amiway Production manegment — Kshitij Nilkant If you want to know about the lyrics of Dhua Dhua then visit here Dhua Dhua song lyrics - Amiway Bantai 2019
